categories: Category:Military officers of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Shareis was a male individual who served as the War Minister of the reconstituted Sith Empire during the Great Galactic War. After the Sith Lord Darth Malgus led an invasion of the planet Ord Radama, Malgus' forces were not resupplied and Malgus subsequently sent Shareis some requests for resources. However, Shareis did not respond to Malgus and he failed to send the Sith Lord any supplies.
